name: Comunicare Digitale
goal: CO.DI is involved in the promotion of the Digital Market, to preserve European capabilities and heritage; and in the exploration of new opportunities inside the Digital Market. It has a long experince in the organization of Digital Technologies and New Media events and conferences; as well as in the realization of TV News and productions to keep informed Italian audience about European Authorities and Institutions.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Environment, External Relations, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport
euInitiatives:
Single Digital Market
Television and Media
5G projects
Internet of Things
Digital Revolution and Services
Spectrum frequency
Copyright
Geo Blocking
European contents (Creative-Europe)
Digital Networking
